tool_description: Evaluates soil organic matter content and quality, assessing its impact on soil health, water retention, nutrient cycling, and overall soil fertility.

soil_texture.description: Primary soil texture (sand, loam, clay, silt)

error_messages: Invalid organic matter percentage: Value must be between 0 and 20 percent.
Invalid soil texture: Use sand, loam, clay, or silt.
Invalid bulk density: Value must be between 0.8 and 2.0 g/cm³.
usage: Input organic_matter_percent and soil_texture for basic assessment. Include bulk_density for more detailed soil health evaluation.

om_status.description: Organic matter level classification (very low, low, medium, high, very high)
